titulo: Daisy Flower Charm | Gold | Pink Enamel | Kanela by Anier
short_description:
• Gold-plated charm
  • Pink enamel finish
  • Perfect for jewelry making
long_description:
This charming Daisy Flower Charm from Kanela by Anier is a delightful addition to any jewelry project. Crafted in gold, it features a pink enamel finish that adds a pop of color and elegance. The charm is perfect for adding a touch of nature to your jewelry, making it a versatile and stylish accessory.

Especificaciones

  • Material: Gold-plated metal
  • Enamel Color: Pink
  • Shape: Daisy flower
  • Size: Approximately 15mm x 15mm
